document: DTSM 2 Analysis of Individual Training 2023 Edition V1.0.docx
content: The purpose of analysis is to determine whether a training need exists, and if so, to define it clearly. It supports defensible decision-making and ensures training is aligned with operational requirements.

document: DTSM 2 Analysis of Individual Training 2023 Edition V1.0.docx
content: Common methods include interviews, questionnaires, observation, and document reviews. Analysts should select a mix of methods suited to the context, ensuring accuracy and breadth of data.
